sentences.sentence: UK's economy shrunk by 0.3% in the month of August and the pound dropped significantly Tuesday night, renewing fears of a recession.

sentences.sentence: Western leaders are maintaining a united front following Russia's escalation in its war on Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: At Tuesday's G7 meeting, they warned Russian President Vladimir Putin of severe consequences if he goes further and uses nuclear weapons.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: At the meeting, Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelensky asked for more air defense systems and for an international monitoring mission on the Belarusian border.

Where there was destruction, the infrastructure will be renewed.

sentences.sentence: We are very glad to see you and we are ready to discuss all issues of mutual interest or cause for concern, for example regarding the situation around the Zaporizhia power plant." And in Crimea, Russian authorities say they have detained eight people in connection with Saturday's explosion on a key bridge.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: According to security services, those held are Russian, Ukrainian and Armenian.

sentences.sentence: Workers have exhumed several more bodies from a mass burial site in the Ukrainian city of Lyman.

sentences.sentence: The authorities are trying to piece together evidence from the more than four months the eastern city spent under Russian occupation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: plant in the Parisia the Polish government has decided to establish distribution points for free iodine tablets throughout the country these activities fall under the so-called crisis management. This is preparation in the event of a nuclear power plant accident.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Tablets containing the so-called stable iodine are intended to block the thyroid gland from possible exposure and from absorbing bad radioactivity iodine, which is released after a possible disaster at a nuclear power plant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: At the moment there is no real threat of radioactive contamination, but we want to be prepared even for the impossible variant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Schools, city halls and fire stations, such as this one in Milanovec, has become the distribution points for tablets.

sentences.sentence: In fact, since February 26 we are allegedly participating in this war because we have accepted refugees here. It was a surprise for all of us about these pills. People are concerned. They ask about these pills. How is it supposed to be done? When is it going to happen?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06

And the procedure will be such that every person interested in taking this preparation will have to come to the distribution points. The tablets will be given to people up to the age of 60 and to children with the written consent of their parents.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In recent weeks many people in Poland have started to buy iodine tablets privately while others remain skeptical of the, questioning possible side effects, as was the case with vaccines. Magdalena Hodovnik from Warsaw.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The UK economy has shrunk unexpectedly by 0.3%, according to the Office for National Statistics.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Data suggests that manufacturing slowed down further, stalling growth during the summer.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And overnight, the pound dropped significantly again after weeks of volatility, all renewing fears the country could be entering a recession, according to analysts. It means it could be harder to find a job and it'll be challenging to get a pay rise. It could even be tougher on everyone's pockets as the situation could mean the Bank of England might increase interest rates again if inflation doesn't go down.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: At the International Monetary Fund Conference on Tuesday, the Governor of the Bank of England, Andrew Bailey, unveiled more measures to calm markets rocked by the government's tax-cutting mini-budget.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: He said he was widening the scope of its daily purchases of government bonds until Friday to include index-linked securities. The support measures are only scheduled to last until then.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The allegations are that there are at least a dozen teachers within the CLRG, the biggest, oldest and most prestigious Irish dance organisation in the world, who have been engaged in what's become known as Fesh Fixing, arranging in advance for their students to get the highest mark possible from judges, not based on their dancing but based on the connection between the judges and the teachers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The world renowned artist Damien Hirst has burnt hundreds of his paintings. It's part of a project he's calling the currency. The works he decided to burn are the ones that buyers chose to keep in a digital form as non-fungible tokens which are commonly referred to as NFTs. To the artist the act is his way of raising profound questions about the essence of art. So instinctively I have a feeling that it's not good to burn the artworks but when I think about it I know I have to burn the artworks because it's part of the process of what I'm doing. But I think when you make artworks it's not just digital and physical or NFTs or anything that make you think like that. Sometimes you look at a painting and you think I need to add another blue splash but you think no if I do it will ruin it and then you think should I or shouldn't I and then you get you know it's a big dilemma and then you do and you spoil it sometimes and then you don't and you regret it other times so it's just one of those artistic decisions the colorful spot paintings were sold on the basis that buyers had the choice between the paper version or the nft form the price of the works started at around 2,000 euros, with some selling for much more.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Over half the buyers decided to take the physical painting.
